Offer: Bank Offer10% off up to ?1,500 on BOBCARD EMI Transactions, Min Txn Value: ?5,000
Terms and Conditions:
What is the Offer?
10% Instant Discount up to ?1,500 on BOBCARD EMI transactions on purchase of select products. 
Additional Instant Discount up to ?500 on BOBCARD Transactions of 6 months & above tenure on purchase of select products.
This offer is applicable on all BOBCARD EMI transactions except transactions made through Bank of Baroda Debit Cards or Corporate Cards.
The bank offer discount that you are able to see on the Product page is applicable on select cards. To check if the discount is applicable on your card, enter the card details on the 'Payment' page and check the discount applied

What are the Offer Benefits?
Base Offers: Sitewide excluding Grocery, Two-wheelers & Travel
Mobiles
Minimum Cart Value - INR 5,000
Max. Discount per card - INR 1,250

Other Categories
Minimum Cart Value - INR 5,00
Max. Discount per card - INR 1,500

*Customer can avail a maximum base offer discount of up to INR 1,500 per Credit Card (EMI Transactions)

Bonus Offer: Sitewide excluding Grocery, Two-wheelers & Travel
Minimum Cart Value - INR 25,000
Max. Discount per card (EMI transactions) - INR 500
Valid on 6 months and above tenure only

In the event the customer returns any/all products in the order placed during the Offer Period, thereby not maintaining the minimum purchase value, as required to avail the Offer, he/she shall not be eligible for the Offer. Accordingly, the amount availed as a discount under the Offer shall stand deducted from any refund(s) processed for the returned product(s).
If an order is cancelled, the offer may take up to 24 hours to refresh for the customer to utilise it again.

What is the offer duration?
1st November 2025 (00:00 Hours) to 30th November 2025 (23:59 Hours)

What are the eligibility conditions?

How do I check if a product is eligible?

This offer is applicable on purchase of select products. 
Offer will be listed on the product page, for all eligible products. Please check before making a purchase.

Is the offer applicable on all BOBCARD Transactions?

This offer is applicable on all BOBCARD EMI transactions except transactions made through Bank of Baroda Debit Cards or Corporate Cards.
Offer is NOT applicable on transactions made through Internet Banking or UPI payment option.
The offer can be redeemed only in serviceable pin codes as per Government guidelines.


Will I get the offer if I pay through Flipkart Gift Card partially?

Yes, you can avail the offer and the offer will only apply on the amount paid through BOBCARD against the eligible product(s). 
For Base Offer, this amount should be equal to or more than INR 5,000. For Bonus Offers, this amount should be equal to or more than ?25,000. 


How many times can this offer be availed?

There is no limit on the number of transactions to avail the Base Offer discount. However, you can avail a Maximum Base Offer Discount of up to INR 1,500 per Credit Card. 
Bonus Offer can only be availed once per card on a single transaction during the offer duration. Valid only on 6 months & above tenure.
Maximum Discount per card is a cumulative savings across all platforms of Flipkart 

How do I avail the offer?
The Validity of the offer ('Term') is from 1st November 2025 (00:00 Hours) to 30th November 2025 (23:59 Hours), unless extended by Bank and Flipkart by mutual consent in writing. 
Under this Offer, Cardholders will get
10% instant discount on the purchase of select products sold on the platform during the offer period.
An additional Instant Discount of up to INR 500 on purchase of select products sold on the platform during the offer period.
The discount will be applied to the Net Cart Value (NCV). NCV shall mean the total value of only the eligible product/s in the cart after all applicable discounts and exchange offer redemptions.
The minimum Net Cart Value (NCV) to avail the Base offer is ?5,000.  
The minimum product value to avail the Bonus Offer discount is ?25,000. Valid only on 6 months & above tenure.
Offer Discount shall be applicable as follows
Maximum Base Offer Discount of up to INR 1,500 per Credit Card can be availed in any number of EMI transactions during the offer period.
Maximum Bonus Offer Discount of up to INR 500 per Credit Card can be availed once during the offer period.
The offer is applicable at www.flipkart.com, m.flipkart.com & Flipkart mAPP (mobile Application) 
The offer is not applicable on payment made via Net Banking or UPI.
Discount will be calculated on the net paid amount by the customer post any other discounts, exchange offer redemptions and refunds.
In the event the customer returns any/all products in the order placed during the Offer Period, thereby not maintaining the minimum purchase value, as required to avail the Offer, he/she shall not be eligible for the Offer. Accordingly, the amount availed as a discount under the Offer shall stand deducted from any refund(s) processed for the returned product(s).

In the event the customer returns any/all products in the order placed during the Offer Period, thereby not maintaining the minimum purchase value, as required to avail the Offer, he/she shall not be eligible for the Offer. Accordingly, the amount availed as a discount under the Offer shall stand deducted from any refund(s) processed for the returned product(s).

What is the offer duration?
Maximum cashback which you can avail in a statement quarter is ?4,000. Statement quarter is defined based on your statement date. For e.g. if your statement date is 15th of every month, then:
1st Quarter: 16th March-15th June
2nd Quarter: 16th June-15th September
3rd Quarter: 16th September-15th December
4th Quarter: 16th December-15th March

What are the eligibility conditions?
Cashback shall not be eligible for following spends/transactions on the Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card 
Purchase of gift cards on Flipkart
EMI transactions
Purchases converted to EMI post facto
Purchase of gold items
Bill Pay and Recharges
The minimum transaction value to be eligible for cashback is ?100
Cashback is capped to ?4,000 per statement quarter

How do I avail the offer?
Use your Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card to make the payment on Flipkart and the applicable cashback will be credited to your credit card account 
Cashback earned for the purchases during the current billing cycle will be credited in the next billing cycle 3 days prior to the statement generation date i.e. if the statement date is 15th March, cashback earned in the February month cycle (16th Jan-15th Feb) will be credited on 12th March

Other Terms and conditions
For the cashback offer, please refer to the detailed T&Cs given below. To check your eligibility for the Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card, please click here
You can earn up to ?4,000 cashback per statement quarter on your Flipkart purchases.
The cashback will be rounded down for each individual transaction. For e.g., If for a transaction of ?1180, the customer is eligible for a cashback of 1% i.e., 1180 * 1% = ?11.8. Only ?11 will be credited to the customer for that individual transaction.
The cashback applicable amount shown on Flipkart?s payment page  is for illustration only, calculated based on a calendar quarter. The actual cashback you earn will be calculated by the Bank, based on your statement quarter. Your statement quarter is determined by your billing date and may not match a calendar quarter.
Axis Bank?s computation of the Cashback shall be final, conclusive and binding on a Card member and will not be liable to be disputed or questioned. Flipkart will not be responsible for any differences between the applicable cashback displayed on the payments page, and the actual cashback credited by the Bank given the statement quarter can be different for each customer.
Cashback earned will be computed based on spends during the statement period minus any returns or refunds during the same period.
Gold and Jewellery purchases on Flipkart will not be eligible for cashback. Any transaction on Flipkart which includes Gold & Jewelery will not earn cashback. 
In case the purchase / transaction is returned / cancelled / reversed post statement generation date, cashback toward such transactions will be debited on the date of such purchase/ transaction reversal.
In case of conversion of a transaction to EMI at a later date, cashback earned on such transaction will be reversed during the same billing cycle as EMI conversion 
The cashbacks earned/reversed during a billing cycle will be visible in the monthly credit card billing statement.
Nothing contained in the cashback proposition shall be construed as a binding obligation on Axis Bank, Flipkart or any participating Merchant Partner to continue the Cashback Scheme after the Scheme Termination Date or to substitute the Cashback Scheme by a new or similar scheme.
Axis Bank may temporarily prohibit any customer from earning cashback or using any features of the program.
The terms and conditions mentioned in the document can be revised or terminated at any time with 30 days prior notice.
The cashback shall not be applicable if the Card has been withdrawn or cancelled or is liable to be cancelled or the account of the Card member is a delinquent Account.
The cashback proposition is made available at the pleasure of Axis Bank and Axis Bank expressly reserves the right at any time and with notice to Card members, to add to and/or alter, modify, change or vary all or any of these Terms and Conditions or to replace wholly or in part, the Cashback Scheme by another scheme, or to withdraw it altogether.
Without prejudice to anything contained in the Terms and Conditions, all disputes, if any, arising out of or in connection with or as a result of the Rewards Scheme or otherwise relating hereto shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts / tribunals at Mumbai.
In the event the user returns any/all products in the order placed during the Offer Period, thereby not maintaining the minimum purchase value, as required to avail the Offer, he/she shall not be eligible for the Cashback Offer.
